text: akkūṭṭarkkākunnu sthiravāsattinuḷḷa svargattēāppukaḷ. avaruṭe tāḻbhāgattkūṭi aruvikaḷ oḻukikkeāṇṭirikkunnatāṇ‌. avarkkaviṭe svarṇaṁ keāṇṭuḷḷa vaḷakaḷ aṇiyikkappeṭunnatāṇ‌. nēriyatuṁ kaṭṭiyuḷḷatumāya paccappaṭṭu vastraṅṅaḷ avar dharikkukayuṁ ceyyuṁ. aviṭe avar alaṅkaricca kaṭṭilukaḷil cāriyirunn viśramikkunnavarāyirikkuṁ. etra viśiṣṭamāya pratiphalaṁ, etra uttamamāya viśramasthalaṁ
